title: Dividing the Screen: Scopes
subtitle: Separating zones of NavBar and the main content.

rightBullets.title: The Problem
rightBullets.description: With a manual approach, how does focus ever leave the navigation bar to get to the main page content?

rightBullets.title: The Solution: `FocusScope`
rightBullets.description: We treat the navigation bar and the page body as two separate, self-contained 'focus zones'.

rightBullets.title: Zone 1: Navigation
rightBullets.description: Focus traversal (up/down arrows) is trapped within the navigation items.

rightBullets.title: Zone 2: Content
rightBullets.description: When the user navigates right, we programmatically move focus to the content area, which then manages its own internal focus.
